actor_awards.notes: Best known for appearing in the 'Road to...' movies with Bing Crosby and Bob Hope, and for her 'Sarong Girl' image. She received two Stars on the Hollywood Walk of Fame (Motion Picture and Radio).

filmography.title: Road to Morocco
filmography.role_description: A beautiful princess who buys two shipwrecked castaways (Hope and Crosby) in this comedy often cited as the best of the series.
filmography.plot: Two carefree castaways wash up on the shores of Morocco and get involved in a power struggle involving a princess and a desert sheik.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Writing, Original Screenplay (Film)

filmography.title: The Hurricane
filmography.role_description: The daughter of a chief on a South Seas island whose marriage is disrupted by a tyrannical governor and a massive storm.
filmography.plot: A Polynesian sailor is unjustly imprisoned by a colonial governor, while a catastrophic hurricane threatens their island.

filmography.title: The Greatest Show on Earth
filmography.role_description: An 'Iron Jaw' aerialist and performer in the circus who sings and performs in this Cecil B. DeMille epic.
filmography.plot: The dramatic lives of trapeze artists, a clown, and an elephant trainer play out against the backdrop of a traveling circus.

filmography.title: Road to Utopia
filmography.role_description: A woman seeking to recover her father's stolen deed to a gold mine in the Alaskan Klondike.
filmography.plot: Two vaudeville performers head to the Alaskan gold rush to find their fortune but get mixed up with stolen maps and thugs.

filmography.title: The Jungle Princess
filmography.role_description: A native girl raised by a tiger who saves a stranded explorer. This film launched Lamour's career and her signature 'sarong' look.
filmography.plot: A native girl with a pet tiger falls in love with an explorer she rescues from the jungle.

filmography.title: My Favorite Brunette
filmography.role_description: A woman who hires a baby photographer posing as a private eye to find her missing uncle.
filmography.plot: A photographer on death row tells reporters about how he was framed for murder while playing private detective.

filmography.title: Road to Singapore
filmography.role_description: A local dancer who becomes the object of affection for two sailors, launching the famous 'Road' series.
filmography.plot: Two sailors try to escape romance and marriage by hiding out in Singapore, only to both fall for the same girl.

filmography.title: Road to Zanzibar
filmography.role_description: A woman who tricks two carnival performers into funding her safari.
filmography.plot: Two sideshow performers travel across Africa on a safari with two women who are actually con artists.

filmography.title: Road to Rio
filmography.role_description: A woman under the hypnotic control of her sinister aunt, whom the boys try to save.
filmography.plot: Two stowaway musicians in Brazil try to save a wealthy woman from being hypnotized into a forced marriage.

filmography.title: Spawn of the North
filmography.role_description: A hotel owner in Alaska who stands by her man during a fishing war.
filmography.plot: Two childhood friends on opposite sides of the law clash over salmon fishing rights in Alaska.

filmography.title: Donovan's Reef
filmography.role_description: A saloon singer and girlfriend of Lee Marvin's character in this John Ford comedy.
filmography.plot: Three World War II veterans living on a French Polynesian island have their paradise disrupted when a daughter arrives.

filmography.title: Road to Bali
filmography.role_description: A princess whose treasure is being sought by two divers (Hope and Crosby). The only color film in the series.
filmography.plot: Two song-and-dance men leave Australia to work as divers in Bali, where they meet a beautiful princess and hunt for treasure.

filmography.title: Johnny Apollo
filmography.role_description: A gangster's moll who falls in love with the college-educated son of a convicted embezzler.
filmography.plot: A college student turns to a life of crime to help his father, who has been imprisoned for embezzlement.

filmography.title: A Medal for Benny
filmography.role_description: The girlfriend of a deceased war hero, dealing with the town's hypocrisy.
filmography.plot: A town tries to capitalize on the heroism of a local boy killed in action, while his father and girlfriend deal with the loss.

filmography.title: Star Spangled Rhythm
filmography.role_description: Lamour appears as herself, performing 'A Sweater, a Sarong, and a Peek-a-Boo Bang' in this all-star musical.
filmography.plot: A Paramount gatekeeper pretends to be the studio boss to impress his son and his son's friends.

filmography.title: The Fleet's In
filmography.role_description: A dance hall hostess and singer who becomes the target of a wager by a shy sailor.
filmography.plot: A shy sailor becomes a lady-killer after a publicity photo makes him look like a hero.

filmography.title: And the Angels Sing
filmography.role_description: One of four singing sisters who gets involved with a bandleader.
filmography.plot: A bandleader tries to exploit a quartet of singing sisters, but romance and family dynamics complicate his plans.

filmography.title: Disputed Passage
filmography.role_description: An American woman raised in China who falls in love with a medical student.
filmography.plot: A medical student is torn between his devotion to science and his love for a woman, clashing with his mentor.

filmography.title: Aloma of the South Seas
filmography.role_description: A native princess who is betrothed to a prince returning from education in the U.S.
filmography.plot: An island prince returns home to stop a revolution and claim his bride.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Cinematography, Best Special Effects

filmography.title: Typhoon
filmography.role_description: A woman found living on an island by a shipwrecked sailor, in a film heavily marketed on her sarong image.
filmography.plot: A sailor is shipwrecked on an island where he finds a beautiful girl and a pearl bed.

filmography.title: Beyond the Blue Horizon
filmography.role_description: A jungle girl who is heir to a fortune and must navigate civilization.
filmography.plot: A jungle girl proves to be the heir to a vast fortune and travels to civilization to claim it.

filmography.title: Man About Town
filmography.role_description: An actress involved in a producer's scheme to make his wife jealous.
filmography.plot: A producer tries to make his wife jealous by pretending to have an affair with his star actress.

filmography.title: Variety Girl
filmography.role_description: Lamour appears as herself in this musical comedy showcasing Paramount contract players.
filmography.plot: The Variety Club, a charity organization, is the backdrop for a story about a young girl trying to break into the movies.

filmography.title: On Our Merry Way
filmography.role_description: A film star in a segment involving two musicians who get roles in her movie.
filmography.plot: A timid clerk becomes a roving reporter and asks people how a child has influenced their lives.

filmography.title: Lulu Belle
filmography.role_description: A Broadway singing star whose rise to fame leaves a trail of broken hearts.
filmography.plot: A singer rises from a dive bar to Broadway stardom, using men along the way, until she is shot in her dressing room.

filmography.title: Creepshow 2
filmography.role_description: Lamour's final film role, playing the wife of a general store owner in the 'Old Chief Wood'nhead' segment.
filmography.plot: Three more bone-chilling tales based on the stories of Stephen King.
